Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 7 lines of a Coptic text (side A) written against the fibres two lines along the fibres and 18 lines, in two columns (side B) against the fibres. These two lines have been cross out and the papyrus is reused. EA 75356, 75357, 75358, 75359, 75360, 75361, 75362 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380741) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380741)
